name: Duality of cat (working title)
description:
You play as a cat balancing between good and evil. You cannot help your cat instincts to destroy things and cause mayhem, but you should not make your owner too angry, or who knows what will happen. 

The game is still very much a work in progress. You can only move and destroy things, no endings or anything yet.

In the future there might be multiple levels and some more gameplay mechanics and more items to destroy. And the cat will turn into bread. 

CONTROLS: 

Move with WASD
Jump with W or Space
Kick with left and right arrow keys

Recommended to play in fullscreen mode. 

If you want to play again, reload the page, there is no restart implemented yet.

CREDITS: 

Gqqish - programming, music
Kissamaagi - programming, 2D art
Macymews - 2D art, character design, animation
